content:
How would I compose a ValueSet with just the leaf nodes from a hierarchical CodeSystem, i.e. just the codes that are not the parent of any other code?
I'm trying to work out how this could be done using these: http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/valueset-filter-operator.html
maybe include all, then exclude where child exists true
@Jim Steel How can I see these "implicit" properties that Ontoserver seems to populate internally? Are there others, other than parent and child?
concept and inactive are also treated specially (i.e. you can't declare new properties or filters with those names that contradict Ontoserver's expectations of them)
It is also possible to populate child and parent explicitly. This is useful if you want poly-hierarchy

In the FHIR CodeSystem you can nest the codes you're defining. Ontoserver maps this onto parent and child properties. As @Jim Steel mentions, you can also (additionally or alternatively) specify them directly.
